org.openimaj.image.feature.local.engine

Class MinMaxDoGSIFTEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.feature.local.engine.MinMaxDoGSIFTEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Engine<MinMaxKeypoint,FImage>

    @Reference(type=Inproceedings,
           author={"Jonathon Hare","Sina Samangooei","Paul Lewis"},
           title="Efficient clustering and quantisation of SIFT features: Exploiting characteristics of the SIFT descriptor and interest region detectors under image inversion",
           year="2011",
           booktitle="The ACM International Conference on Multimedia Retrieval (ICMR 2011)",
           month="April",
           publisher="ACM Press")
public class MinMaxDoGSIFTEngine
extends Object
implements Engine<MinMaxKeypoint,FImage>
    A modified implementation of Lowe's difference-of-Gaussian detector and SIFT feature extraction technique that also records whether features are detected at local minima or maxima by looking at the sign of the difference of Gaussian. This information can then be used for enhancing matching or clustering.

    Internally, this class is identical to DoGSIFTEngine, but uses a OctaveMinMaxKeypointCollector instead of an OctaveKeypointCollector.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
